game.name: Stranded Survivors
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Survive swarms of monsters, rescue stranded animals, and build a base where they can be safe in this unique bullet heaven. Turn your rescues into upgrades and build a safe town to create new weapons and recruit powerful heroes that unlock new ways to survive til dawn.
